Title: Cyklopat
Actors: Mihail Mutafov, Nevena Kokanova, Penka Tsitselkova, Nikola Dadov
Plot: The main character is a Commander of a nuclear powered submarine. Once a very promising hydro acoustics expert, he sacrificed his scientific career to devoting himself to serving his homeland as a warrior. Gradually, he figures out that the worth of mastering the art of war is in its non-appliance.
